amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to modify Section 1611 (Early Voting) to require that States provide for ten hours of early voting per day rather than four hours, as specified in the base text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Ms. Houlahan.
